pkgmetadata.longdescription: Advanced L-Moment Fitting of Distributions // A complete framework for frequency analysis is provided by 'LMoFit'. It has functions related to the determination of sample L-moments as in Hosking, J.R.M. (1990) doi:10.1111/j.2517-6161.1990.tb01775.x, the fitting of various distributions as in Zaghloul et al. (2020) doi:10.1016/j.advwatres.2020.103720 and Hosking, J.R.M. (2019) https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=lmom, besides plotting and manipulating L-space diagrams as in Papalexiou, S.M. Koutsoyiannis, D. (2016) doi:10.1016/j.advwatres.2016.05.005 for two-shape parametric distributions on the L-moment ratio diagram. Additionally, the quantile, probability density, and cumulative probability functions of various distributions are provided in a user-friendly manner.
